name: True Colors (itch) (c10ud_ten)
description:
Two lone warriors cross paths in a desolate arena, and do battle in the only way they know... who will show their true colors?

True Colors can be played against a computer or another player. Player one uses [Z] and player two uses [M]. The goal of the game is to hit your opponent with the paintball by punching it towards them. The ball moves faster each time it is hit - hold your attack button to increase its speed even more, and vary your charge duration to through your opponent off. Who will come out on top?

(As an extra bonus, the colors of the two players are randomly chosen each time the game boots up - refresh the page and try it!)

Made for the One Button Game Jam, hosted by Humble Toymaker Games
